name: Lightning Water
description:
Lightning Water is a 2D movement-based, Action-Adventure platformer for PC, where the player controls a wave of water infused with the essence of thunder.

Overcome challenges and become stronger in this action-packed platformer.

Playtime is around 1~2 hours, depending on level of skill. There is not yet a save system, though one may be added in the future.

Please leave a comment on your experience and how you liked the game! It's greatly appreciated and will help me to make the game better!
